sentences.english: Ms Chen qian cloud find seven dead, want to kill dato may other people.
sentences.chinese: 倩雲查到陳七女士已死，要殺拿督的可能其它人。

sentences.english: Through the 7 times catches and 7 times releases, Meng Huo was finally influenced.
sentences.chinese: 通過對孟獲的七擒七放，終於感化了孟獲。

sentences.english: If I have more than a seven-hour layover, I'd like to stay overnight.
sentences.chinese: 若是轉機要等超過七小時，我希望在那裏過夜再飛。

sentences.english: By the Song Dynasty some seven centuries later, the porcelain industry was flourishing.
sentences.chinese: 宋代，大約七世紀後，是瓷業最繁榮的時期。

sentences.english: The target is seven-tenths of 1% of gross national income.
sentences.chinese: 這項標準是援助達到國家粗收入的千分之七。

sentences.english: Seven. You will feel this immediately in your arms.
sentences.chinese: 用力推，七，你的手臂很快就會有感覺。

sentences.english: There are only seven desks and seven chairs in it.
sentences.chinese: 裏面有隻由七張課桌和七把椅子。

sentences.english: The 706 Factory House is a modern version of the ancient Roman city-state.
sentences.chinese: 諾大的七零六廠房，如同現代版的古羅馬城邦。

sentences.english: And then my vision fell upon the seven tall candles upon the table.
sentences.chinese: 然後，我的目光落在桌上的七根長蠟燭上。
在拉丁文中，Septem是“七”的意思。

sentences.english: No road team has won a title in Game 7 since 1978.
sentences.chinese: 自從1978年久沒有一支客隊能在搶七大戰中贏球。

sentences.english: Half way up the Brightness Hill, Reed Flute Cave is seven kilometers northwest of the center of Guilin.
sentences.chinese: 半路上的亮度，蘆笛巖是西北七公里的桂林的中心。

sentences.english: A radio announcer for the Steelers invented the "Terrible Towel" in nineteen seventy-five.
sentences.chinese: 爲鋼人隊電臺播音員發明七五年“可怕的毛巾”。

sentences.english: Stephanie moved to Long Beach, California, in the mid-seventies.
sentences.chinese: 七O年代中期，戴芬妮剛到美國加州長堤。

sentences.english: There's too much potential for abuse when it comes to Player GMs.
sentences.chinese: 有太多的潛力，濫用當談到球員七三。

sentences.english: The only two missing star positions are for Betelgeuse and Rigel.
sentences.chinese: 只有兩個失蹤星級職務是參宿四和參宿七。
